pageProps.content:
Experience

Bwindi Lodge is a luxurious eco-lodge set in the forest canopy of Uganda’s beautiful Bwindi Impenetrable National Park.
This area is renowned for its life-changing gorilla trekking expeditions. The Buhoma region of Impenetrable Forest has at least 3 habituated gorilla families that live in the thick, damp tropical undergrowth. Tracking them is exciting & rewarding.
The area is also home to monkeys, chimpanzees & countless birds which does not make it hard to believe why this pocket of the primaeval forest is one of the most biologically diverse areas on Earth & a World Heritage Site.

Stay

Bwindi Lodge comprises 8 luxury bandas & 1 larger deluxe banda, all offering spectacular views of the forest. Each banda is complete with an en-suite bathroom & private terrace.
The central lodge area features a dining area, bar & forest spa that offers a 30-minute complimentary massage per guest per day.

Activities

Activities at Bwindi Lodge are ample!
Guests can track gorillas in the wild, enjoy nature walks to nearby waterfalls or rivers (& take a swim in the rockpools) & enjoy local tapas from the Bwindi Bar that are served in the wonderful garden overlooking the forest.
They can also go on a tea-picking tour where the locals will demonstrate how tea is grown, picked & traditionally processed in Uganda.

subfolders.title: Buhoma Lodge
subfolders.description: Buhoma Lodge is situated at the gateway to Bwindi Impenetrable Forest & is one of only 2 lodges set within the national park & an ideal choice when embarking on your bucket-list gorilla trekking expedition.  The lodge is renowned for its warm & welcoming atmosphere & little extras like a complimentary massage, a boot cleaning service & a hot water bottle in bed make guests feel extra welcome. Since Buhoma Lodge is located just steps away from the trek start point, gorillas have been spotted popping in for an occasional visit, while the resident monkeys tend to visit the gardens almost daily.

subfolders.title: Chameleon Hill Lodge
subfolders.description: Chameleon Hill Lodge enjoys a spectacular location overlooking an unspoilt Rift Valley lake framed by the rugged Virunga Volcanoes.   Lying between the nearby Bwindi Forest & Mgahinga Park - Uganda’s prime gorilla trekking destinations – Chameleon Hill Lodge offers not only the chance to track mountain gorillas, but also to enjoy hiking & mountain biking as well as exhilarating boat trips & cultural interactions. The bold, vibrant design of the lodge gives a feeling of rustic charm & creates a warm family-friendly atmosphere.

subfolders.title: Clouds Mountain Gorilla Lodge
subfolders.description: Clouds Mountain Gorilla Lodge in Uganda has easy access to at least 6 gorilla families who live in the nearby Bwindi Impenetrable Park – a bucket-list activity on everyone’s list! Cloud’s goal is to support long-term protection of the gorillas & originated as a conservation project between the Nkuringo community, the African Wildlife Foundation & the Uganda Safari Company.   The views from the lodge are truly breathtaking – from the large windows guests will have uninterrupted views over the tranquil forest & Virunga volcanoes.

subfolders.title: Sanctuary Gorilla Forest Camp
subfolders.description: Set within a private concession within the heart of the Bwindi Impenetrable National Park, you will find Sanctuary Gorilla Forest Camp. Providing a perfect balance between remote beauty & classic luxury, Gorilla Forest Camp is the ideal choice for those wanting to experience this World Heritage Site in style. It is no surprise that Bwindi is Uganda’s premier safari destination when it comes to gorilla trekking.  This memorable experience will leave lasting memories as you come face to face with one of Africa’s most popular primates.
